text: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡعَثَ فِيٓ أُمِّهَا رَسُولٗا يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَاۚ وَمَا كُنَّا مُهۡلِكِي ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا وَأَهۡلُهَا ظَٰلِمُونَ

translation.en: And never would your Lord have destroyed the cities until He had sent to their mother a messenger reciting to them Our verses. And We would not destroy the cities except while their people were wrongdoers
translation.id: Dan Tuhanmu tidak akan membinasakan negeri-negeri, sebelum Dia mengutus seorang rasul di ibukotanya yang membacakan ayat-ayat Kami kepada mereka; dan tidak pernah (pula) Kami membinasakan (penduduk) negeri; kecuali penduduknya melakukan kezaliman
